channel.title: How to install modem on linux
channel.description: hello now i have got windows Linux i couldn't install my modem. i am using a computer with windows xp and whenever i want windows linux i just insert windows Linux cd. but i tried to connect to the internet i couldn't. and i am using my modem already on my pc for windows xp but Linux it didn't work. how do i install the modem drive on windows Linux or what should i do. need help please

item.title: How to install modem on linux
item.dc:creator: @happy_world happy_world
item.description:
@happy_world wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:7, topic:141359”][quote author=Shorty626 link=topic=193580.msg1742738#msg1742738 date=1189337766]
Get the linux distribution drivers off your manufacturers website and install
[/quote]

Lynx != Linux.[/quote]

what is the site for Linux distribution drivers

Read full topic

hello
now i have got windows Linux i couldn’t install my modem. i am using a computer with windows xp and whenever i want windows linux i just insert windows Linux cd.
but i tried to connect to the internet i couldn’t. and i am using my modem already on my pc for windows xp but Linux it didn’t work. how do i install the modem drive on windows Linux or what should i do.
need help please
